revised_title: Development and Structure of Ostrich Tribe Skulls
tldr: This article examines the development and structure of the skulls of the ostrich tribe, using various bird species as examples. The author describes the stages of skull development in ostriches, emus, and other birds, comparing their features to those of mammals and reptiles. The study also highlights the differences between the facial arches of birds and mammals, and discusses the formation of secondary bones in birds.
